scripts.ec2:deploy-ssl: npm run ec2:send-files && npm run ec2:setup-files
scripts.ec2:send-files: source ./.env && scp -i devops-ca-aws.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no setup-ssl.sh server.crt privatekey.pem ubuntu@${EC2_IP}:~
scripts.ec2:setup-files: source ./.env && ssh -i devops-ca-aws.pem -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntu@${EC2_IP} 'bash ~/setup-ssl.sh && rm ~/setup-ssl.sh'
